images.description: The main Fabled Galaxy logo header with cosmic starfield background and elegant typography
Stylized galaxy map background for navigation and exploration sections
A mesmerizing crystalline galaxy formation with prismatic light refracting through cosmic structures. Ethereal blues and purples dominate this otherworldly scene.
images.usage: Crystal worlds, magic sections, arcane themes

images.description: Majestic planetary rings illuminated by starlight, creating halos of cosmic dust and ice particles orbiting in perfect harmony
A sleek spacecraft navigating through nebulous star clouds, with engine trails creating ribbons of light against the cosmic backdrop
images.usage: Technology sections, space exploration, sky worlds

images.description: An enigmatic bio-organic vessel or creature with eye-like features, blending mechanical and living design elements in an unsettling harmony
images.usage: Ocean worlds, dark worlds, mysterious creatures

images.description: Abstract fractal patterns resembling ethereal fingers reaching through dimensions, with recursive geometric patterns that seem to pulse with arcane energy
images.usage: Magic system sections, arcane worlds, mystical themes

images.description: A towering figure of immense presence, their silhouette commanding attention against swirling cosmic energies. Could be a guardian, deity, or ancient being.
images.usage: Legends sections, mythological beings, character profiles

images.description: A mysterious figure surrounded by flickering candlelight, their features partially obscured in dancing shadows. Exudes an air of secrets and hidden knowledge.
images.usage: Dark worlds, mysterious characters, civilization leaders

images.description: A vibrant, colorful character portrait bursting with energy and whimsy. Wild hair and expressive features suggest a free spirit connected to chaotic magic.
images.usage: Forest worlds, fae creatures, magic users

images.description: An evocative portrait study capturing the essence of an otherworldly being. Features suggest both wisdom and otherworldly origins.
A cosmic horror entity with tentacles and multiple eyes, existing between dimensions. Ancient and unfathomable, it represents the unknown terrors of the universe.
images.usage: Dark worlds, legendary creatures, cosmic horror themes

images.description: An enigmatic image that defies easy categorization, inviting contemplation and interpretation. Perfect for mysteries and the unexplained.
images.usage: Mysterious elements, undefined magic, ambiguous content

images.description: A scenic landscape vista capturing a moment of alien beauty. Rolling terrain under unusual skies suggests worlds waiting to be explored.
images.usage: Planet landscapes, terrestrial worlds, scenic sections

images.description: Delicate pink poppies swaying in an ethereal breeze, their petals catching light like fragments of dawn. Life flourishing in gentle abundance.
images.usage: Forest worlds, nature themes, life and growth

images.description: A field of pink poppies stretching toward distant horizons, creating rivers of color through alien meadows.
images.usage: Forest worlds, nature sections, peaceful themes

images.description: Close-up detail of poppy blooms revealing intricate patterns and textures, the mathematics of nature expressed in organic form.
images.usage: Detail sections, nature close-ups, organic designs

images.description: Poppies at golden hour, their pink petals glowing with inner warmth as day transforms to twilight.
images.usage: Transition sections, twilight themes, warm imagery
